column4: how can I get OpenOffice to offer correctly spelled words for misspelled words?
in MS Office it offers a correctly spelled word
Does right-clicking the word do it?
no, right click doesnt show any correct or alternate words
Right-click- autocorrect ? Does it for me.
i dont see autocorrect when I right click
how did you get autocorrect to appear as u right click?
Are you right-clicking the word with the red squiggly?
and this is  a newly installed Ubuntu, 2 days ago
first time im running OO,  did u install something to get autocorrect to appear?
No, it worked like that "right out of the box" try installing the OO dict for your language.
i was highlithing the word first, thats why it gave a different menu :P
did u see what I was doing wrong?
because I was highliging the word, it gave me wtong menu, paste etc
